reviewText: Early Access Review\n\nI bought this game yesterday I think and it is a pretty good game by what I saw. This game definetly needs finishing and touch ups and stuff but this game has some very good potential. Nice job 314 Arts and keep the hard work up guys. I am getting a new MSI gaming laptop with very high quality hardware so when this game and all the other high graphic games I have now, I will be able to run this game at 100 FPS +. So there is something to look forward to. But 314 Arts, overall you have a very cool game here and I like it a lot already. So I will give your game a thumbs up :)

reviewText: Early Access Review\n\nAt the moment this game is a tech demo,its simple as that. Its an Early Access game and it shows. However the vison behind this game is great. They are aiming to make the singleplayer like SWAT and I cannot tell you how long I've been waiting for that. It still does not have singplayer but it is only 2 days old at the time of this review the multiplayer will also become much more in depth,and what you would expect out of an FPS shooter,but with SWAT vs Terroists/criminals,and they've already have had 2 bug fixes. I would recommend to support these commited developers with there vision. :)

reviewText:
Early Access Review

Police Infinity is, although it is still early access, already a nice and fun game to play, especially together with some friends.
It already contains enough content to have fun and variability in gameplay.
The developers are friendly, work close together with the community and invest time to answer questions and improvement suggestions from players.
I really enjoy playing this game with my friends and can definitely recommend it to anyone who likes to spend evenings with friends online.
If you are not quite sure whether to buy this game, you have to see the fact that the game is by far not finished and it has a big potential.
I hope I could convince you to invest into this great game.

See ya ingame :)
voteText: 6 of 8 people (75%) found this review helpful

reviewText:
Early Access Review

In an attempt to separate itself from the Casual Shooters on the Market,
all it does it show the lack of anything fun within the title.

MY REVIEW VIDEO: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yMZUjPAs_YQ

Seriously. Its so bland, and boring, and so lifeless that it isn't even worth your time.

PROS
- Graphics are okay(Not Great)
- Multiple Maps
- Easy to navigate UI

CONS
- Game is so lacking of anything enjoyable
- Weapon Sounds are meh
- UI, although easy to navigate, is lacking
- Character movement is fast and janky
- Server desync and hard lag
- Weapon Classes don't even show up
- V/O work is so loud and obnoxious
- Community is full of nuthuggers who attack you for an opinion
- Devs have admitted they are not Professional, and I can already predict the path this game will take...

reviewText:
Early Access Review

I am sorry developers, but the game is simply not what I expected.

!!!PLEASE READ FULL REVIEW AND NOT JUST THE NO RECOMMEND" THINGY!!!

Dear all
date:
I'd like to state that I play a lot of FPS games and have done so for most of my gaming life.
Try the game yourself in order to form your own opinion though. I do not speak for everybody regarding this game.

This game looked fun to me when I watched the trailer
hoursPlayed: when I played the game I was a bit shocked.\n\nWARNING
voteText:
THE GAME IS EARLY ACCESS SO PLEASE DO FURTHER RESEARCH IN ORDER TO MAKE YOUR DESCISION. THIS REVIEW MIGHT BE OUTDATED AT THE TIME YOU'RE CONSIDERING BUYING THE GAME.

Pros:
Nice graphics
Cool Customization
Decent weapons selection
Nice variety of maps for an early access game
Menu is simple
Optics are all nice

Cons:
The lag on some maps (when close to fire)
The game doesn't have much of a playing community
High price for so little content.
No singleplayer modes (firing range)

What would I change?
I'd better optimize the game (I know you are working on this)
Add more maps
More guns
More servers (especially in Asia)
Work on the sounds a bit.
Fix some lighting issues on some maps - The shadow of the smoke is solid on the heli crash map (for example)
Add a jump feature. Please...It's hard not having the ability to jump when it is pretty much a standard in modern games.
Add something awesome to the game! The mention of parkour in the key bindings could be taken to a next level. Add a parkour mode of sorts in which you press a button and you go into Ezio/Altair style parkour on the maps! (this would be awesome with the FPS aspects.

Now
helpfulPercent: I cannot recommend the game at this point in time as it is not full enough to be a multiplayer game (there is no community)
votesTotal: if you and a couple of friends (1-10) bought the game
votesFunny: then I can imagine it being a very very fun game.\n\nKeep working on the game and I'm sure it'll grow and I'll get it again
column16: for now I must request a refund. (sorry devs)\n\nAnyways
column17: that's just my opinion. Buy the game and form your own though! You may disagree with everything I said in this review!\n\n"
column21: 9 of 17 people (53%) found this review helpful 1 person found this review funny

reviewText:
Early Access Review

This game is released today, and it's in alpha phase, so it's in very rough shape right now. And a dev told me that the game was supposed to be released later than today, but they had to release it now because they didn't have enough funds for further development.

If you really want to support devs, you can buy this game. Otherwise, there're many better games at the same price for you to play.

FYI: This game is made with Unity.

reviewText:
Early Access Review

Well this is a game.
There is some good and there is some bad.

Let's start with the good:
The main menu was all good and simple.
The guns handled fine and look rather nice.
Some sounds were ok.
The environment was simple but detailed ok.

Now what was wrong with it:
No main menu sound.
The M16/M4 sounded off.


Now some of these things can easily be fixed and changed. I'm sure it could be ok with people but for the price they want why not just go play CS:GO or Insurgency. If this game was sold for 5$ I'm sure it would be more popular, so at the current state I would not recommend this game.

See more here:
https://youtu.be/0d8Zi2j37V8
